metadata.title: CVE-2024-26839 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:IB/hfi1: Fix a memleak in init_credit_return When dma_alloc_coherent failsto allocate dd->cr_base[i].va, init_credit_return should deallocatedd->cr_base and dd->cr_base[i] that allocated before. Or those resourceswould be never freed and a memleak is triggered.
